# Modern Mustard Seed

> AI-powered products, voice agents, and business automation. Built with faith, precision, and full-stack execution.

## About
Modern Mustard Seed is a technology studio founded by Sarah Scarano. We build voice agents, production apps, and brand systems that grow businesses — powered by AI, grounded in faith.

## Services
- Voice Agents: Enterprise-grade voice AI for phone conversations, appointment booking, customer service, and lead qualification — 24/7.
- Full-Stack Development: Production-grade web applications from concept to deployment. React, Next.js, databases, APIs, authentication, payments.
- Brand & Strategy: Brand DNA extraction, content strategy, and go-to-market execution.
- AI-Powered Products: Custom AI tools, SaaS platforms, and intelligent systems.
- Business Automation: End-to-end workflow orchestration, CRM pipelines, and multi-system integrations.
- Creative & Generative Tech: Immersive digital experiences, generative art, and interactive visualizations.

## Tech Stack
React, TypeScript, Next.js, Vite, Tailwind CSS, Supabase, Stripe, Trigger.dev, Three.js, Vapi (Voice AI), Google Gemini, OpenAI

## Products
- VoiceStaff: AI voice agents that handle real business phone calls 24/7
- Make Me Studio: AI-powered creative production platform
- Ignition: Idea-to-Income agentic swarm
- Wild Daisy Command Center: AI-powered operations hub with 30 specialized agents
